message.content: {"given_definition_quality":85,"better_definition":"to take a taxi","sentence":"我打车回家。","image_prompt":"A young person standing by the side of a street, raising their hand as a yellow taxi car approaches, with a soft apocalypse animation style—muted pastel colors, cracked buildings in the distance, slight overgrown plants along the sidewalk, evening sky, and a mix of realism and stylized animation.","sentence_translation":"I take a taxi home."}
